entities.label: Report on Allegations of Evasion of Pristina Airport Charges
United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo
Official of the Passenger Handling Services, Pristina Airport

edges.label: 1. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: The investigation was conducted by UNMIK.

edges.label: 2. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: Pristina Airport's revenue collection procedures were under investigation.

edges.label: 3. Alleged Evasion
edges.tooltip: The Airline was alleged to have evaded airport charges.

edges.label: 4. Revenue Collection Dispute
edges.tooltip: Dispute over the collection of landing, handling, and passenger taxes.

edges.label: 5. Security Involvement
edges.tooltip: Securicor staff were involved in security checks but not liable for revenue collection.

edges.label: 6. Immigration Oversight
edges.tooltip: Immigration Department staff were involved in passenger processing.

edges.label: 7. International Coordination
edges.tooltip: UK Immigration staff were involved in processing international passengers.

edges.label: 8. Flight Route
edges.tooltip: The Airline operated flights between a European Airport and Pristina.

The Airline: Failure to collect all revenues for landing, handling, and passenger tax.
Non-integration of the automatic checking system with financial reporting.
